reviews:
I ended up buying a pair of gloves at a local store which I am wearing all the time. I probably shouldn't have purchased these because...
- they are not waterproof
- I think like most knit mittens, they will stretch around my wrists and not keep out the snow
- they are a little difficult to put on or take off.

All of the cons to these mittens are more a con to buying knit mittens. Overall, these were well-made, but I think I would not buy again because I prefer a thick waterproof glove instead.
product_name: Woogwin Mens Winter Fingerless Gloves Fleece Thermal Wool Knit Convertible Mittens(black)
